text:
The cartoon "Spider-Man: Through the Universes" will be continued
01 Nov 2019, 22:11 by Victor Podvolotsky
The return date to the big screens has already been announced.
Yesterday in the official Twitter account of the cartoon "Spider-Man: Through the Universes" a mysterious message appeared that something was coming. The most daring fans suggested that the sequel was announced and were right. Today, the continuation of the multiverse was officially announced.



Spider-Man: Through the Universes will return to the big screens on April 8, 2022! There are no details about the film yet, but theories from comic book fans are unlikely to take long.
If you have not watched the first part of the cartoon, which was released in December 2018 and received an Oscar, we recommend that you read our review. It provides several good reasons why this picture should not be missed.
